short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that let you filter people's retoot on timeline or user's profile page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some people like to interact with people that post original content. Currently Mastodon doesn't have official content to let people do that on backend.
This extension will filter the retoots on timeline or other people's profile, so that people can get to know a new people and decide wether they want to follow/unfollow them more efficiently.
